programme.sub-title: I Brought the Divorce Papers; My Mom Doesn't Love Me

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: That's Your Baby, Stop Using Me; Mom, Stop Drinking and Love Me
programme.desc: Danielle and Fred fell in love on the job, but as soon as Danielle got pregnant, Fred accused her of cheating on him; Ja'Quan is fed up with the abuse and physical altercations he has with his mother, Gina.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: The 3 Kids Aren't Mine! / Out Of Control Teens
programme.desc: On today’s Karamo, Stephen received a random call from a woman claiming that his girlfriend, Martina, was having sex with her man. Next, Shannon and Latoya are best friends that have two out of control daughters.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlocking My Phone…But You Have A Mistress

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Best Friend Stole from Me / Unlock The Phone: 20 Years of Lies?
programme.desc: Jazmin and Erica have been besties for years! But things took a turn when Jazmin’s swimwear went MIA.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: We're Here to Unlock Your Phone, Not Mine!
programme.desc: Brandon's marriage is spiraling out of control, he believes that Tiffany is cheating on him with several men!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Listen to Me!; Unlock the Phone: What Are You Hiding?
programme.desc: Keon's new girlfriend thinks he is too close with his child's mother and that he's trying to get back together with her; Latreice says her 13-year-old daughter is out of control.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Who's My Baby's Father... Don or His Brother Tim?
programme.desc: Brenda and her man Aaron return after proving that Aaron was a cheater! Now they’re here to prove that Aaron didn’t father Tammie’s baby. Then, Cat will test her boyfriend Tim and his brother Don to find out who her child’s father is!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Cheating Wife...3 Babies... Are These Kids Mine?
programme.desc: The men are positive they are not the fathers - the women know they are! It's a war of words and the stakes couldn't be higher. MAURY's paternity test results finally reveal the truth!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With Your Friend…Our 2 Kids May Not Be Yours
programme.desc: Mothers want men who deny being fathers to take paternity tests.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: After The Shocking Results ... Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: Some of our most shocking guests return to update their incredible stories. Some were demanding answers to their paternity mysteries. Some came because they feared that their lovers were being unfaithful. Some had shocking secrets to reveal.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 7 Babies ... 6 Men Tested ... Is He The Dad?
programme.desc: Alicia's here to find out if either of these two men are the father of her two babies. Then, Amanda is furious that Jason denies her baby. She says she's going to rub the results right in his face! Plus, Aria's own husband denies all 3 of her kids!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If Her Baby is Yours ... Our Marriage Is Over!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Have I Finally Found My Long Lost Family?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept with Both of You the Same Night…Who's My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: John and his wife believe Keia is trying to trap him with someone else’s baby because she’s obsessed with him!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Man... 3 Women... 4 Babies... Is He The Dad?
programme.desc: Ben came here denying Angela's child. But these results knock Ben off his feet, literally! Then Michelle and Jeremy are here because they need a DNA test to finally put an end to their paternity mystery.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If You Cheated With My Family … It's Over
programme.desc: Lesli thinks that her boyfriend is cheating and that the truth is between his legs. Then, Cara plans to marry Josh in three weeks, but after he's busted with a decoy, can their wedding possibly go ahead as planned?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Got Me Pregnant at 13! You're The Dad!
programme.desc: First, Khylee says Clarence is her baby's dad, but he and his wife agree he can't be. Then, Jason denies he's the father of Martina's baby because he thinks she cheated on him. Finally, Quita is here to confront her ex-boyfriend for denying her son.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Being Shady
programme.desc: Deborah Estrella says she went to the defendant’s hair salon because her hair was black and orange, and she wanted to change it to a light blond uniform color. Well, the woman ruined the job. She was left with four different colors in her hair, making her look like a freak. She’s suing for the $740 she paid and also the cost to redo her hair. The Defendant refuses to believe she messed up and is accused of being shady.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Dog-Sitting Disaster
programme.desc: Mary sues Theresa for $5,000, claiming she stole her three beloved dogs. Theresa says Mary gave them away after losing her home and refuses to return them or pay. It's a heartbroken owner versus a "kindhearted" caretaker in this canine battle.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Stole My Kids TV
programme.desc: Plaintiff Mumena Boru accuses her ex, Angelo Woodard, of breaking into her apartment, stealing her TV, and taking her phone. Angelo claims the TV is his and countersues for $5,000, alleging wasted time and emotional distress.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Wedding Disaster
programme.desc: Antonio Lopez and Yajaira Rodriguez sue wedding planner Maria Martinez for $5,000, claiming she did nothing and stole their money. Maria says Yajaira canceled meetings, and a couple’s fight caused chaos, leaving her stuck in the middle.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Bed Bug Infestation
programme.desc: Plaintiff Caitlin Crommett sues landlord Allan Arfa for $4,135, claiming her apartment was infested with bedbugs. Allan denies the infestation, alleging Caitlin fabricated the story to break her lease early. Who’s telling the truth?

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Had A Wife, A Fiance, And A Mistress?
programme.desc: Arthur is suing his ex-fiancé for the price of her engagement ring after she refused to return it.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: 23 Years Later
programme.desc: After two decades of not knowing her Father, Hope was approached by a man named Tim at a gas station.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom And Daughter In Distress
programme.desc: Latrice believes that her daughter, Kyeshi’s reckless behavior is tearing her family asunder!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Why? / Unlock The Phone: Stop Cheating
programme.desc: Kwane needs help her with her mommy issues. She says her mother dealt in drugs, alcohol, and sex work.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Livid Over a Loan
programme.desc: Jill is suing Laura after failing to repay a loan, but Laura says it was a gift.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Threw Me Out Of Your Taxi
programme.desc: Allison is suing the taxi driver she hired to drive her home after a medical procedure for kicking her out.
